TestCase.Name: Payable Invoice Flow Smoke Test 1
TestCase.Description: Check flow diagrame in this link: https://i.imgur.com/WAP9sC2.png
TestCase.Author: thaihoang.nguyen

Keyword.Name: Random
Keyword.Description: Generate a random string or number and store it into buffer.xml

Param.Name: sKey
Param.Description: Key in buffer file will store value

Param.Name: sLength
Param.Description: Number of chars will be generated

Keyword.Name: CombineVariable
Keyword.Description: Combine multiple parameter and store result into one buffer variable

Param.Name: sKey
Param.Description: Key name will store in buffer file

Param.Name: sNumber
Param.Description: Number of Variables need to combine

Keyword.Name: LaunchBrowser
Keyword.Description: Launch browser to URL

Keyword.Name: Login
Keyword.Description: Login to AP outsource webpagee

Keyword.Name: GoToPayablesInvoices
Keyword.Description: Page Home - Go To Payables Invoices Feature

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: optional) - isClick = false mean check Payables Invoices Button Exist or not

Keyword.Name: Click_ButtonCreateNewTransaction
Keyword.Description: Click on button Create New Payable Invoice (in Payable Invoice Page)

Keyword.Name: CreateNewPayableInvoice
Keyword.Description: Create new payable invoice

Param.Name: sInvoiceFile
Param.Description: give a path to file for uploading

Param.Name: sCreateTime
Param.Description: Create Time - after click Finish button

Keyword.Name: Logout
Keyword.Description: Log out

Keyword.Name: Login
Keyword.Description: Login to AP outsource webpagee

Keyword.Name: GoToPayablesInvoices
Keyword.Description: Page Home - Go To Payables Invoices Feature

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: optional) - isClick = false mean check Payables Invoices Button Exist or not

Keyword.Name: FilterTransaction
Keyword.Description: Filter transaction - Will click on filter button and set filter set (https://i.imgur.com/YBJ50XW.png)

Param.Name: sExpectedResultCount
Param.Description: Number of transaction | 0: not found | 1: found 1 result | null: by pass this parameter - use in case add multiple search

Keyword.Name: SelectAndClickWorkButton
Keyword.Description: Select one Payable Invoice and click on Work button (https://i.imgur.com/rWrSfrs.png), this keyword is used after keyword FilterTransaction to make sure just have one transaction in Payable Invoice Page

Param.Name: sTimeExecute
Param.Description: Time after click Work button - For page load

Keyword.Name: ProcessAPayableInvoice
Keyword.Description: Action on a Payable Invoice - This keyword is use after user select a transaction and click Work (keywork SelectAndClickWorkButton)

Keyword.Name: Logout
Keyword.Description: Log out

Keyword.Name: Login
Keyword.Description: Login to AP outsource webpagee

Keyword.Name: GoToPayablesInvoices
Keyword.Description: Page Home - Go To Payables Invoices Feature

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: optional) - isClick = false mean check Payables Invoices Button Exist or not

Keyword.Name: FilterTransaction
Keyword.Description: Filter transaction - Will click on filter button and set filter set (https://i.imgur.com/YBJ50XW.png)

Param.Name: sExpectedResultCount
Param.Description: Number of transaction | 0: not found | 1: found 1 result | null: by pass this parameter - use in case add multiple search

Keyword.Name: SelectAndClickWorkButton
Keyword.Description: Select one Payable Invoice and click on Work button (https://i.imgur.com/rWrSfrs.png), this keyword is used after keyword FilterTransaction to make sure just have one transaction in Payable Invoice Page

Param.Name: sTimeExecute
Param.Description: Time after click Work button - For page load

Keyword.Name: ProcessAPayableInvoice
Keyword.Description: Action on a Payable Invoice - This keyword is use after user select a transaction and click Work (keywork SelectAndClickWorkButton)

Keyword.Name: Logout
Keyword.Description: Log out

Keyword.Name: Login
Keyword.Description: Login to AP outsource webpagee

Keyword.Name: GoToPayablesInvoices
Keyword.Description: Page Home - Go To Payables Invoices Feature

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: optional) - isClick = false mean check Payables Invoices Button Exist or not

Keyword.Name: FilterTransaction
Keyword.Description: Filter transaction - Will click on filter button and set filter set (https://i.imgur.com/YBJ50XW.png)

Param.Name: sExpectedResultCount
Param.Description: Number of transaction | 0: not found | 1: found 1 result | null: by pass this parameter - use in case add multiple search

Keyword.Name: SelectAndClickWorkButton
Keyword.Description: Select one Payable Invoice and click on Work button (https://i.imgur.com/rWrSfrs.png), this keyword is used after keyword FilterTransaction to make sure just have one transaction in Payable Invoice Page

Param.Name: sTimeExecute
Param.Description: Time after click Work button - For page load

Keyword.Name: ProcessAPayableInvoice
Keyword.Description: Action on a Payable Invoice - This keyword is use after user select a transaction and click Work (keywork SelectAndClickWorkButton)

Keyword.Name: FilterSearchPage
Keyword.Description: Filter transaction - Will click on search button and set filter set (https://i.imgur.com/wMyOr41.png)

Param.Name: sTransactionType
Param.Description: Select Transaction Type | Payables Invoices | Payments | Any

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Default Value Input - Date time with format MMddyyyy

Param.Name: sValue2
Param.Description: Second Value use in case of sOperator is RANGE - Date time with format MMddyyyy

Param.Name: sTimeToSearch
Param.Description: Time after click Search button - in case search action take a lot of time

Param.Name: sExpectedResultCount
Param.Description: Number of result | 0: not found | 1: found 1 result | null: not check - by pass this parameter - use in case add multiple search

Keyword.Name: CheckStatusOfAPayableInvoice
Keyword.Description: Select one Payable Invoice in the search page and check it status (https://i.imgur.com/B07ytDD.png), this keyword is used after keyword FilterSearchPage to make sure just have one transaction in Result

Keyword.Name: CleanUp
Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark start cleanup

Keyword.Name: Logout
Keyword.Description: Log out

Keyword.Name: CloseBrowser
Keyword.Description: Close browser

Keyword.Name: GoToPayablesInvoices

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: optional) - isClick = false mean check Payables Invoices Button Exist or not

Keyword.Name: FilterTransaction
Keyword.Description: Filter transaction - Will click on filter button and set filter set (https://i.imgur.com/YBJ50XW.png)

Param.Name: sExpectedResultCount
Param.Description: Number of transaction | 0: not found | 1: found 1 result | null: by pass this parameter - use in case add multiple search

Keyword.Name: SelectAndClickWorkButton
Keyword.Description: Select one Payable Invoice and click on Work button (https://i.imgur.com/rWrSfrs.png), this keyword is used after keyword FilterTransaction to make sure just have one transaction in Payable Invoice Page

Param.Name: sTimeExecute
Param.Description: Time after click Work button - For page load

Param.Name: sExpectedResultCount

Keyword.Name: FilterSearchPage
Keyword.Description: Filter transaction - Will click on search button and set filter set (https://i.imgur.com/wMyOr41.png)

Param.Name: sTransactionType
Param.Description: Select Transaction Type | Payables Invoices | Payments | Any

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Default Value Input - Date time with format MMddyyyy

Param.Name: sValue2
Param.Description: Second Value use in case of sOperator is RANGE - Date time with format MMddyyyy

Param.Name: sTimeToSearch
Param.Description: Time after click Search button - in case search action take a lot of time

Param.Name: sExpectedResultCount
Param.Description: Number of result | 0: not found | 1: found 1 result | null: not check - by pass this parameter - use in case add multiple search

Keyword.Name: CheckStatusOfAPayableInvoice
Keyword.Description: Select one Payable Invoice in the search page and check it status (https://i.imgur.com/B07ytDD.png), this keyword is used after keyword FilterSearchPage to make sure just have one transaction in Result

Keyword.Name: CheckAssignedToTaskValueOfAPayableInvoice
Keyword.Description: Select one Payable Invoice in the search page and check it Assigned To Task value (https://i.imgur.com/Wfnenfc.png), this keyword is used after keyword FilterSearchPage to make sure just have one transaction in Result

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Status need to check | Return for Research and Resolution

TestCase.Name: Dismiss two times at Status Controller Approval
TestCase.Author: thaihoang.nguyen

Keyword.Name: Random
Keyword.Description: Generate a random string or number and store it into buffer.xml

Param.Name: sKey
Param.Description: Key in buffer file will store value

Param.Name: sLength
Param.Description: Number of chars will be generated

Keyword.Name: CombineVariable
Keyword.Description: Combine multiple parameter and store result into one buffer variable

Param.Name: sKey
Param.Description: Key name will store in buffer file

Param.Name: sNumber
Param.Description: Number of Variables need to combine

Keyword.Name: LaunchBrowser
Keyword.Description: Launch browser to URL
